question: I've HAD it with my endo; I need someone who's a THYROID specialist, not a diabetes doc.  I'm dealing with a papillary recurrence and need someone who's aggressive with this stuff, not a "wait-and-seer".  I'm in Indianapolis - tell me about your great Indy area thyroid cancer endo.  Any IU Cancer Center patients out there?
title: Recommend your Indy area thyroid cancer endo
